summary: 检测Modern Events Calendar Lite WordPress插件是否存在授权机制不正确漏洞，该漏洞可能导致未认证用户导出所有事件数据的CSV或XML文件。
summary_en: Detect the lack of authorisation checks vulnerability in the Modern Events Calendar Lite WordPress plugin, which may allow unauthenticated users to export all events data in CSV or XML format.
